snippet.title: Kobo Redux 0.7.1 Replay Demo
snippet.description:
Some in-game footage of Kobo Redux, demonstrating the replay feature, which serves as a continuous checkpoint, allowing the player to decide from which exact point to retry the level.

Kobo Redux is a frantic 80's style 2D shooter, inspired by the look and feel of 90's arcade cabinets. The gameplay is fast and unforgiving, although with less of the frustrating quirkiness of the actual games of the 80's. A true challenge in the spirit of the arcade era!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=850481684
https://olofson.itch.io/kobo-redux
https://github.com/olofson/koboredux
http://olofsonarcade.com/
